sentences: For five years, Rogers studied classical guitar at Mannes School of Music.
Beginning in the 1990s, he spent over ten years as a member of the jazz fusion band Lost Tribe with David Binney, David Gilmore, Fima Ephron, and Ben Perowsky.
For several years he was a member of Michael Brecker's bands, and was a founding member of the quartet Forq.
